Sentencas: In this contribution, we present interval methods for mathematical modeling, for parameter identification, and for control design of dynamical systems.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: The corresponding approaches are applied to the thermal subsystem of a high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) which is available as a test rig at the Chair of Mechatronics at the University of Rostock.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: In practice, most internal parameters of SOFC stack modules cannot be measured directly.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: Therefore, system characteristics such as heat capacities or internal thermal resistances cannot be identified exactly, but only bounded.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: For this reason, intervals represent a good first approach to dealing with parameter uncertainty.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: In the first part of the paper, we present interval methods for the parameter identification aiming at the computation of globally optimal parameterizations.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: In comparison with classical local optimization procedures, the approximation quality is improved by the presented identification approach.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: The corresponding bounds for admissible domains are used to design a robust sliding mode control law for arbitrary operating points compensating the impact of disturbances and parameter uncertainties in a reliable way.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: In the second part of the paper, we show a simple approach to handling non-smoothness appearing in SOFC models based on ordinary differential equations in a verified way.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: We use a generalized derivative definition for a certain type of non-smooth functions inside the algorithm of the verified solver ValEncIA-IVP to be able to compute solutions to non-smooth initial value problems.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control

Sentencas: The applicability of our method is demonstrated using the designed sliding mode controller.
Titulo: Thermal behavior of high-temperature fuel cells: reliable parameter identification and interval-based sliding mode control
